title: Headless Horseman
summaries: The Headless Horseman is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that starts to spawn beginning with (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) wave 5 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) wave 9 of the Pumpkin Moon event. He is an exceptionally dangerous enemy due to his speed, high contact damage, and immunity to knockback. The Headless Horseman attacks by charging forward and doing a low, quick jump to reach the player. Additionally, on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Headless Horseman can also throw a Pumpkin Head projectile, which moves in a wavelike manner and homes into the player for an extended period of time.
Killing a Headless Horseman during the Pumpkin Moon event will add (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 50 / 100 / 125 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 25 points to the final score.
